oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Regulations for the Army of Confederate States," 1863 edition
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Regulations for the Army of Confederate States" book published in Richmond, Virginia, in 1863. Wartime edition of official Confederate Army tactics, military protocols, and rules for officers and various departments (Engineers, Ordnance, etc.) of CSA Army. The book contains signatures of Col. T. N. Kizer and Col. W. [J.?] Williams in the front. It was owned by Joseph F. Williams who lived near Selmer, McNairy County, Tennessee.
